amendment.description: Providing a sense of the Senate on the need for a new direction in Iraq policy and in the civilian leadership of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4904.

Amendment SA 4904 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S9030; text: CR S9030) Providing a sense of the Senate on the need for a new direction in Iraq policy and in the civilian leadership of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4904 proposed by Senator Reid.
